message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item worth $150 to you, and we're looking to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $135. Don't miss out on this opportunity to get a great deal!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the introductory price, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  I'm happy to pay $125 for the product. What do you think?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In order to accommodate your needs while still ensuring a fair profit, I would like to propose an adjusted price of $130 for the product. This still represents a good saving for you compared to its value, while allowing us to maintain a reasonable margin. Please let me know if this offer suits you.
